category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_synchronize_sites
preference.preference_description: Specifies the sites with which Classification data can be shared with Multi-Site Collaboration. The sites specified in this preference appear in the Shared Sites dialog box in the Class Details pane in Classification Admin. Valid Values: Multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter site name. Site names must be entered into the database in a Organization/Sites format.
